name: Rgo
tagline: Riak Go binding targetting both protobufs and HTTP
body: # rgo Riak Go binding based around interoperability with both HTTP and protocol buffer support. The aim is to provide a relatively unified interface for both interfaces. ## Installation Recommended only for development of the library in the current state. Once completed installation will be by: go get http://github.com/RadioactiveMouse/rgo ## Current Status: Partially complete with many things still broken/not implemented. Not suitable for use in development or production. ## License MIT
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
